item.title: Bought my 6 year old daughter an iPhone
item.description: My daughter is an avid reader and writer, so as she is preparing to go into 1st grade, I wanted to give her an outlet to publish online. What I did was set up a Tumblr blog for her at gracyl.ryancollins.org. I chose Tumblr because it allows her â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
